channel.title: Comments on: 5 Great Ways To Leave A Tip
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Origami Lover
item.dc:creator: Origami Lover
item.description: Good post. I just found this <a href="http://digg.com/d31EMMQ" rel="nofollow">Origami-inspired Twitter icon</a> at Digg, which you can use on your blog if it is running WordPress.
item.content:encoded: Good post. I just found this Origami-inspired Twitter icon at Digg, which you can use on your blog if it is running WordPress.
